logoPrompt: Design a modern logo for JC Handyman Specialist featuring a hammer and wrench crossed over a shield, in blue tones. Include the business name in bold, professional font. Add subtle elements of repair work for a local handyman theme.

hero.headline: Your Local Handyman with a Twist
hero.subheadline: Serving Bedfordshire with precision and care. Why replace when you can REPAIR!

about.title: About Us
about.description: At JC Handyman Specialist, we pride ourselves on delivering personalized handyman services across Bedfordshire. Our expert team is dedicated to handling all your home repair needs with a unique twist. Whether it’s repairing UPVC windows or creatively respraying front doors, we offer solutions that save you time and money. Trust us for reliable, local tradesmen who listen to your needs and exceed your expectations.
about.imagePrompt: A friendly handyman standing next to a neatly organized toolbench, smiling confidently. The setting is a well-lit workshop with various tools and repair materials neatly arranged.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Explore a wide range of handyman services tailored for homeowners in Bedfordshire. From specialized home repairs to everyday fix-ups, we bring expertise and care to every project.

items.title: Specialist Repairs
items.description: Expert assistance for your home repair needs, including UPVC windows, bath and shower trays, and more.

items.title: Handyman Jobs
items.description: General handyman services perfect for minor repairs and house maintenance.

items.title: End of Tenancy Repairs
items.description: Quick and efficient repairs to restore your property before a new tenant arrives.

items.title: Local Expertise
items.description: Our team consists of skilled tradesmen who understand the unique needs of Bedfordshire residents.

items.title: Customer Satisfaction
items.description: We are committed to providing an exceptional customer experience with every service call.

items.title: Value for Money
items.description: Offering cost-effective solutions that emphasize repair over replacement, saving you time and money.

items.title: Prompt Service
items.description: We respect your time by offering quick response and efficient repairs for your convenience.

gallery.title: Our Work
gallery.subtitle: Take a look at some of our recent projects and see the quality we deliver.

images.title: UPVC Window Repair
images.description: Restoring durability and functionality to your windows.
images.imagePrompt: A handyman working on a UPVC window in a bright sunny room, with tools laid out neatly. The window shows a clear view of a colorful garden.

images.title: Shower Tray Fix
images.description: Completed repair on a bespoke shower tray before and after.
images.imagePrompt: A sparkling clean bathroom showcasing a repaired shower tray, with shining tiles and reflections of light, emphasizing cleanliness and precision work.

images.title: Stone Cill Restoration
images.description: Bringing elegance back to your home’s stone features.
images.imagePrompt: A close-up of a restored stone cill on a classic brick house, highlighting the texture and color restoration, under a clear blue sky.

quotes.name: John Doe
quotes.quote: Excellent service! Friendly, prompt, and professional. They fixed my shower tray quickly and efficiently.

quotes.name: Jane Smith
quotes.quote: Affordable and reliable, JC Handyman Specialist handled all our end of tenancy repairs beautifully.

quotes.name: Tom Brown
quotes.quote: I highly recommend JC Handyman for any repair work. Their attention to detail is unmatched!

items.question: What areas do you serve?
items.answer: We proudly serve the entire Bedfordshire region, offering personalized service to all local residents.

items.question: Do you provide emergency repairs?
items.answer: Yes, we offer emergency repair services to ensure your home is safe and functional as quickly as possible.

items.question: Can you handle custom repair requests?
items.answer: Absolutely! We love working on custom repairs that require a creative touch and expert skill.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Contact us today to discuss your repair needs or schedule a service. Our team is ready to assist you.
